t_170: How can I see my current orders? 170
t_172: Look at the top left corner. Click the right turning clock. 172
t_173: Note: You can update and re-submit orders in the view 173
t_174: If the right turning clock is not visible, orders haven't been submitted yet 174
t_176: The signup process is completed successfully. 176
t_177: Now, you can join games as a player or create your own games as a game master. 177

t_189: Orders for your units are required 189
t_190: You haven't submitted any orders yet 190
t_191: How to enter and submit orders? 191
t_192: 1. Go to the map and set the view on 'current situation' or 'orders' (not 'previous orders') 192
t_193: 2. Click the zone with the unit which should receive orders. Choose the order type in the window which pops up. 193
t_194: (alternatively you can click on the refering button on the 'Units & Orders' list) 194
t_195: 3.1 'Attack', 'Support Hold': Click the zone you want to attack / support 195
t_196: 3.2 'Support Move', 'Convoy': First click the zone with the unit which should be supported to move or to be convoyed. Then click the zone where the unit should be supported or convoyed to. 196
